original_text: “‘If a man has sexual relations with his daughter-in-law, both of them are to be put to death. What they have done is a perversion; their blood will be on their own heads.
korean_text: 누구든지 그의 며느리와 동침하거든 둘 다 반드시 죽일지니 그들이 가증한 일을 행하였음이라 그들의 피가 자기들에게로 돌아가리라

sentences.original_text: If a man has sexual relations
both of them are to be put to death
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 둘 다 사형에 처해져야 한다

sentences.original_text: What they have done is a perversion
their blood will be on their own heads
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 피는 그들 자신의 머리에 있을 것이다
